addIncentive(address,uint256,uint256).details: Permissioned function, only callable by incentive token manager.

params.amount: The amount of the token to add as an incentive.
params.incentiveRate: The amount of the token to incentivize per BGT emission.
params.token: The address of the token to add as an incentive.

params.account: The account to get the balance for.

returns._0: The balance of the staked tokens.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to stake.
The amount of tokens to withdraw.

params.account: The account to calculate the reward for.

returns._0: The amount of reward earned by the account.

exit(address).details: Only the account holder can call this function, not the operator.Clears out the user self-staked balance and rewards.

params.recipient: The address to send the 'BGT' reward to.

returns._0: The amount staked by a delegate.

getReward(address,address).details: The operator only handles BGT, not STAKING_TOKEN.Callable by the operator or the account holder.

params.account: The account to get the reward for.
params.recipient: The address to send the reward to.

returns._0: The amount of the reward claimed.
The total reward vested over the duration.
The total amount staked by delegates.
The count of active incentive tokens.

params._bgt: The address of the BGT token.
params._stakingToken: The address of the staking token.

returns._0: The timestamp of the last reward distribution.

params.reward: The amount of reward to notify.

params.account: The account to get the operator for.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to recover.
params.tokenAmount: The amount of token to recover.

params.token: The address of the token to remove.

rewardPerToken().details: Gives current reward per token, result is scaled by PRECISION.

params.account: The account to retrieve the reward balance for.

returns._0: The current reward balance of the specified account.

params._rewardDistribution: The address that is allowed to distribute rewards.

params._operator: The address that will be allowed to claim and manage rewards.

params._rewardsDuration: The new duration of the rewards.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to stake.

updateIncentiveManager(address,address).details: Permissioned function, only allow factory owner to update the manager.

params.newManager: The new manager of the incentive token.
params.token: The address of the incentive token.

params.account: The account to retrieve the reward for.

returns._0: The current reward balance of the specified account.

params.manager: The address of the manager that can addIncentive for this token.
params.minIncentiveRate: The minimum amount of the token to incentivize per BGT emission.
params.token: The address of the token to whitelist.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw.

addIncentive(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add an incentive token to the vault.The incentive token's transfer should not exceed a gas usage of 500k units. In case the transfer exceeds 500k gas units, your incentive will fail to be transferred to the validator and its delegates.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the balance of the staked tokens for an account.

delegateStake(address,uint256).notice: Stake tokens on behalf of another account.

delegateWithdraw(address,uint256).notice: Withdraw tokens staked on behalf of another account by the delegate (msg.sender).

distributor().notice: The address of the distributor contract.

earned(address).notice: Retrieves the amount of reward earned by a specific account.

exit(address).notice: Exit the vault with the staked tokens and claim the reward.

factory().notice: Returns the address of the factory contract.

getDelegateStake(address,address).notice: Get the amount staked by a delegate on behalf of an account.

getRewardForDuration().notice: Retrieves the total reward vested over the specified duration.

getTotalDelegateStaked(address).notice: Get the total amount staked by delegates.

getWhitelistedTokens().notice: Get the list of whitelisted tokens.

getWhitelistedTokensCount().notice: Get the count of active incentive tokens.

incentives(address).notice: the mapping of incentive token to its incentive data.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Initialize the vault, this is only callable once and by the factory since its the deployer.

isFactoryOwner(address).notice: Returns if the user is a owner of the factory contract.

isFactoryVaultManager(address).notice: Returns if the account is a vault manager of the factory contract.

isFactoryVaultPauser(address).notice: Returns if the account is a vault pauser of the factory contract.

lastTimeRewardApplicable().notice: Returns the timestamp of the last reward distribution. This is either the current timestamp (if rewards are still being actively distributed) or the timestamp when the reward duration ended (if all rewards have already been distributed).

lastUpdateTime().notice: The last time the rewards were updated.

maxIncentiveTokensCount().notice: The maximum count of incentive tokens that can be stored.

notifyRewardAmount(bytes,uint256).notice: Allows the distributor to notify the reward amount.

operator(address).notice: Get the operator for an account.

pause().notice: Allows the factory vault pauser to pause the vault.

periodFinish().notice: The end of the current reward period, where we need to start a new one.

recoverERC20(address,uint256).notice: Allows the factory owner to recover any ERC20 token from the vault.

removeIncentiveToken(address).notice: Allows the factory vault manager to remove a whitelisted incentive token.

rewardPerTokenStored().notice: The last updated reward per token scaled by PRECISION.

rewardRate().notice: The reward rate for the current reward period scaled by PRECISION.

rewardToken().notice: ERC20 token in which rewards are denominated and distributed.

rewards(address).notice: Get the reward balance for a specific account.

rewardsDuration().notice: The time over which the rewards will be distributed. Current default is 7 days.

setDistributor(address).notice: Allows the factory owner to set the contract that is allowed to distribute rewards.

setMaxIncentiveTokensCount(uint8).notice: Allows the factory owner to update the maxIncentiveTokensCount.

setOperator(address).notice: Allows msg.sender to set another address to claim and manage their rewards.

setRewardsDuration(uint256).notice: Allows the factory owner to update the duration of the rewards.

stakeToken().notice: ERC20 token which users stake to earn rewards.

totalSupply().notice: The total supply of the staked tokens.

undistributedRewards().notice: The amount of undistributed rewards scaled by PRECISION.

unpause().notice: Allows the factory vault manager to unpause the vault.

updateIncentiveManager(address,address).notice: Update the manager of an incentive token.

userRewardPerTokenPaid(address).notice: Get the user reward per token paid.

whitelistIncentiveToken(address,uint256,.notice: Allows the factory owner to whitelist a token to incentivize with.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw the staked tokens from the vault.

documentation.text: @notice The maximum count of incentive tokens that can be stored.
@notice The address of the distributor contract.
@notice The mapping of accounts to their operators.
@notice the mapping of incentive token to its incentive data.
@dev The Distributor grants this contract the allowance to transfer the BGT in its balance.
